Description.Text:
Position Villa Elisa Hotel is situated in Marina Centro of Rimini, at about 150 meters from the beach, is also close to the evening walk.
Restaurant Air conditioned Restaurant.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last refurbishment: 2010.
Breakfast:sweet and salty buffet. During meals fixed menu of 3 courses, fruit and dessert.
Check in from 02:00 pm - Check out by 10:00 am.
